snippet: His newest book, "Dogfight: The 2012 Presidential Campaign in Verse," is a collection of satirical poems about the just-finished election.
abstract: His newest book, "Dogfight: The 2012 Presidential Campaign in Verse," is a collection of satirical poems about the just-finished election.

headline.main: Calvin Trillin Returns to Verse to Chronicle the Election
headline.print_headline: Calvin Trillin Writes Election in Verse Bites
